title: PBE creating new account - "Something went wrong.Please refresh the page and try again."
body:
Hi guys,
so I tried to create a PBE account and while trying to find a username it kept saying that the username is already taken. Which is fine so I kept trying until it start saying "Something went wrong- Please refresh the page and try again". Even if i put a username that I know is not available anymore it doesnt say "username taken" it straight up goes to the "something went wrong...". I tried deleting Cache and Cookies and also tried signing up in another browser. It does not work it keeps saying that something went wrong? What do I do now? I have been trying to get a Pbe account for a Long time now I thought is finally my day but ...

replies.body: That's a strange error!  I'm curious if your account was created but is stuck in some kind of loop.  Reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help locate your PBE account.  We'll see you there!
